articles.author: Matt Jarvis
articles.title: Microsoft are adding a dedicated AI button to Windows keyboards as they call 2024 “the year of the AI PC” - Rock Paper Shotgun
articles.description: New Copilot button is the first big change to Microsoft’s keyboards since the Windows key almost 30 years ago.
articles.content: Get ready to infuriate yourself in a whole new way as you swap mistakenly opening the Windows Start Menu with an accidental keystroke for summoning an AI determined to paint you a picture. Microsoft … [+2450 chars]
